mapper.insert: INSERT INTO song(userId, songTitle, playResource, genre, clickedNum, open, uploadDate, uploadTime, publicCnt) VALUES (#{userId}, #{songTitle}, #{playResource}, #{genre}, #{clickedNum}, #{open}, #{uploadDate}, #{uploadTime}, #{publicCnt})
mapper.update: update song set songTitle=#{songTitle}, song.open=#{open}, publicCnt = #{publicCnt} where id = #{id} and userId = #{userId}
